scripts.start: npm install && cd FE_P3 && npm install && cd ../BE_P3 && npm install && (npm run seed || npm run seed:dev || echo Running without seed...) && cd .. && npx concurrently "npm run dev-fe" "npm run dev-be"
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev-fe" "npm run dev-be"
scripts.seed: cd BE_P3 && (npm run seed 2>/dev/null || npm run seed:dev 2>/dev/null || echo 'No seed script found')
